text.__SUMMARY__: Justicia petiolaris is a plant species in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to Swaziland and eastern and southern South Africa.
text.Subspecies:
There are three subspecies:
J. p. subsp. petiolaris
J. p. subsp. bowiei (C.B. CI.) Immelman
J. p. subsp. incerta (C.B. CI.) Immelman
